sentences.en: "Such lovely clothes. I'd no idea Milan was so wonderful," she raved.
sentences.cn: “这些时装太漂亮了。我没想到米兰是如此的精彩，”她赞不绝口。

sentences.en: Clothes were thrown in the luggage in an untidy heap.
sentences.cn: 衣服被乱糟糟地扔进旅行箱里。

sentences.en: He was still in his work clothes.
He'd put his dirty laundry in the clothes basket.
sentences.cn: 他会把自己的脏衣服扔进洗衣篮里。

sentences.en: Her bed was crisply made, her clothes put away.
sentences.cn: 她的床收拾得很整洁，衣服也收起来了。

sentences.en: Her mother had bundled all her Forties clothes up and burnt them.
sentences.cn: 她母亲把她四十几岁时穿的所有衣服都包起来烧掉了。

sentences.en: His clothes were creased, as if he had slept in them.
sentences.cn: 他的衣服皱巴巴的，好像他是穿着衣服睡的。

sentences.en: His work clothes, having become saturated with oil, had to be cleaned.
sentences.cn: 他的工作服已经被油浸透，该洗洗了。

sentences.en: I showered and put on clean clothes.
sentences.cn: 我淋浴后穿上干净的衣服。

sentences.en: I would love a hot bath and clean clothes.
sentences.cn: 要是能洗个热水澡、换身干净的衣服就太好了。

sentences.en: Many of the clothes come from the world's top fashion houses.
sentences.cn: 这些服装中有很多出自世界顶级时装设计公司。

sentences.en: She came in, rain streaming from her clothes and hair.
sentences.cn: 她进来时，雨水顺着她的衣服和头发往下流。

sentences.en: She had decked him out from head to foot in expensive clothes.
sentences.cn: 她用昂贵的服装把他从头到脚打扮一新。

sentences.en: She put in some clothes, odds and ends, and make-up.
sentences.cn: 她将一些衣服、化妆品和零碎物品放了进去。

sentences.en: The front room was strewn with books and clothes.
sentences.cn: 起居室里到处都是书和衣服。

sentences.en: There is an olde worlde look about the clothes for summer.
sentences.cn: 这些夏装看上去有复古风范。

sentences.en: What sort of clothes was he wearing?
Your old clothes will be gratefully accepted by jumble sale organisers.
sentences.cn: 旧货义卖的组织者会感激地领受您捐赠的旧衣物。

phrases.tran_cn: 挂衣服的架子；衣架（等于coat hanger）

trans.tran_en: the things that people wear to cover their body or keep warm
the things that people wear to cover their body or keep warm
